# What is Tabulator?
Tabulator is an interactive table viewer for exploring tabular data such as CSV or tab-delimited files. It provides an easy way to look through rows and columns of your dataset directly in your browser.
After selecting a dataset, the table will be displayed. You can click on column headers to sort the data, or use the search box to quickly find specific rows.
## Key Features
- **Sorting**: Click on any column header to sort the data ascending or descending. - **Filtering**: Use the search box to filter and find specific values in the table. - **Scrolling**: Browse through all your data easily, even if the table is very large. - **Exploration**: Review and explore your dataset without needing any setup or configuration.
To learn more about Tabulator and its capabilities, visit: [http://tabulator.info/](http://tabulator.info/)
